change.changenote: Note: This regulation has been placed in the Regulations Point in Time collection. This regulation is not repealed.

bcl:section.bcl:text: Of the railway properties described as

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: PID 025-981-625, Parcel A (Plan BCP10779) of Part of District Lot 3085 Peace River District shown on Plan 32999,
PID 025-981-633, Parcel B (Plan BCP10779) of Part of District Lot 3085 Peace River District shown on Plan 32999, and
PID 013-019-805, that Part of District Lot 1629, Peace River District as shown on Plan 32999,

bcl:section.bcl:text: the portions of those properties that are identified as road on the map attached as Schedule A are designated surplus property as those portions do not relate to the provision of revitalization rail services.

bcl:centertext.in:em:
The map in Schedule A is exempt from publication. It may be seen at the following location:
British Columbia Railway Company, Suite 600, 221 West Esplanade,
North Vancouver, BC V7M 3J3, telephone: 604 678 4714, fax: 604 678 4702

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: British Columbia Railway Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 36, section 52 (8)]
